item.title: Klarna’s stock will trade for the first time in a few hours — here’s what to expect from the IPO
item.description: Klarna has a $15 billion valuation after its IPO priced above the expected range.

item.title: Oracle’s stock is doing something never seen before on Wall Street: Inside the historic move
item.description: No company worth over $500 billion has ever gained more than 25% in a single day. And Oracle’s stock is up far more than that.

item.title: Insurance should protect your finances. People say it’s crushing their budgets instead.
item.description: Premium payments are often lumped into the cost of transportation, healthcare and housing, but the price of protection is quietly breaking consumers.

item.title: Don’t let Apple’s stock dip fool you. The iPhone 17 could power a big rally.
item.description: Melius Research analyst Ben Reitzes believes Apple’s stock could reach $290, boosted by increased revenues from its new iPhones.
